data.title: Mike Riola - Rehrig Pacific Company
data.meta_description: With over 23 years of experience in the injection molding industry, including a recent… · Experience: Rehrig Pacific Company · Location: Huntington Beach · 500+ connections on LinkedIn. View Mike Riola’s profile on LinkedIn, a professional community of 1 billion members.
data.text:
“I have known Mike for several decades and he is an outstanding leader. He has the ability to guide and inspire people who are hard to lead. Mike is multi faceted and can accomplish many tasks and excel in them all. I recommend Mike Riola with no hesitation to any opening he is seeking. The very best to you Mike. Ajit ”

“I had the pleasure of working with Mike during his career at Rehrig Pacific. Mike is a team player that is deeply invested in the people around him whether they report to him or not. He cares immensely about his work and forms incredible relationships with those with whom he works. Any team will benefit from Mike’s passion and commitment to his work and the people around him.”
